description: These cargo pants are cut from durable cotton canvas and feature a rugged camo pattern.
fitting_details: Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
Size 40W has an 11¾" rise and an 18" leg opening.
Size 46W has a 12½" rise and a 19½" leg opening.
Belt loops. Side adjusters. Zip fly with a signature buttoned closure.
Two front snapped pockets. Interior right hip pocket. Cargo pocket at each thigh. Two back snapped pockets.
"Utility Polo RL" label above the back right pocket.
product: Classic Fit Camo Canvas Cargo Pant
